document_data.name: Sword Heralds
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Sword Heralds''' were a group of [[mage]]s that arrived unheralded in [[Cormyr]] several centuries prior to 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

Before their abrupt departure, the Sword Heralds worked on a variety of projects that improved Cormyr, the most notable being the construction of extra-dimensional refuges, otherwise known as [[hideaway]]s, that protected against the threat of foul weather, roaming brigands and monsters.
